Aggressive Dodger.description: Enanched Any attack performed following a perfect evade
Aggressive Dodger.skill_level_1: Any attack performed following a perfect evade has its damage increased by 20%.
Aggressive Dodger.skill_level_2: Any attack performed following a perfect evade has its damage increased by 30%.
Aggressive Dodger.skill_level_3: Any attack performed following a perfect evade has its damage increased by 40%.
Aggressive Dodger.skill_level_4: Any attack performed following a perfect evade has its damage increased by 50%.
Aggressive Dodger.skill_level_5: Any attack performed following a perfect evade has its damage increased by 60%.

Artillery.description: Increases damage of gunlance's ammo/Wyvern Fire attacks, charge blade's impact phials, and sticky ammo
Artillery.skill_level_1: Increases damage of gunlance's ammo/Wyvern Fire attacks, charge blade's impact phials, and sticky ammo by 10%.
Artillery.skill_level_2: Increases damage of gunlance's ammo/Wyvern Fire attacks, charge blade's impact phials, and sticky ammo by 15%.
Artillery.skill_level_3: Increases damage of gunlance's ammo/Wyvern Fire attacks, charge blade's impact phials, and sticky ammo by 20%, increases gunlance's ammo and charge blade's phial amount by 1.
Artillery.skill_level_4: Increases damage of gunlance's ammo/Wyvern Fire attacks, charge blade's impact phials, and sticky ammo by 30%, increases gunlance's ammo and charge blade's phial amount by 1.
Artillery.skill_level_5: Increases damage of gunlance's ammo/Wyvern Fire attacks, charge blade's impact phials, and sticky ammo by 40%, increases gunlance's ammo and charge blade's phial amount by 1.

Blast Attack.skill_level_1: Increases weapon's blast buildup value by 50.
Blast Attack.skill_level_2: Increases weapon's blast buildup value by 75.
Blast Attack.skill_level_3: Increases weapon's blast buildup value by 100.
Blast Attack.skill_level_4: Increases weapon's blast buildup value by 125.
Blast Attack.skill_level_5: Increases weapon's blast buildup value by 150.

Burst.description: Increases attack power after landing consecutive hits in a short span of time
Burst.skill_level_1: Landing consecutive hits in a short span of time increases attack power by 5% for 4 seconds.
Burst.skill_level_2: Landing consecutive hits in a short span of time increases attack power by 10% for 4 seconds.
Burst.skill_level_3: Landing consecutive hits in a short span of time increases attack power by 15% for 4 seconds.
Burst.skill_level_4: Landing consecutive hits in a short span of time increases attack power by 20% for 4 seconds.
Burst.skill_level_5: Landing consecutive hits in a short span of time increases attack power by 30% for 4 seconds.

Critical Boost.description: Increases the damage multiplier of critical hits
Critical Boost.skill_level_1: Increases the damage multiplier of critical hits to 130%.
Critical Boost.skill_level_2: Increases the damage multiplier of critical hits to 135%.
Critical Boost.skill_level_3: Increases the damage multiplier of critical hits to 140%.
Critical Boost.skill_level_4: Increases the damage multiplier of critical hits to 145%.
Critical Boost.skill_level_5: Increases the damage multiplier of critical hits to 150%.

Fighting Spirit.description: Increases damage dealt when the Special Gauge becomes full
Fighting Spirit.skill_level_1: When the Special Gauge becomes full, damage dealt increases by 10% for 20 seconds.
Fighting Spirit.skill_level_2: When the Special Gauge becomes full, damage dealt increases by 15% for 20 seconds.
Fighting Spirit.skill_level_3: When the Special Gauge becomes full, damage dealt increases by 20% for 20 seconds.
Fighting Spirit.skill_level_4: When the Special Gauge becomes full, damage dealt increases by 25% for 20 seconds.
Fighting Spirit.skill_level_5: When the Special Gauge becomes full, damage dealt increases by 30% for 20 seconds.

Fortify.description: Increases attack power each time you revive after fainting during a hunt
Fortify.skill_level_1: Increases attack power by 10% for 10 seconds each time you revive after fainting during a hunt.
Fortify.skill_level_2: Increases attack power by 15% for 10 seconds each time you revive after fainting during a hunt.
Fortify.skill_level_3: Increases attack power by 20% for 10 seconds each time you revive after fainting during a hunt.
Fortify.skill_level_4: Increases attack power by 30% for 10 seconds each time you revive after fainting during a hunt.
Fortify.skill_level_5: Increases attack power by 40% for 10 seconds each time you revive after fainting during a hunt.

Hellfire Cloak.description: Inflicts yourself with Hellfireblight at the start of a hunt, increasing your attack power and descreasing your defense
Hellfire Cloak.skill_level_1: Inflicts yourself with Hellfireblight at the start of a hunt, or when a certain amount of damage is dealt to a monster.
Hellfire Cloak.skill_level_2: In addition to the effects of Lv1, decreases your defense by 50 and increases your attack power by 150 while inflicted with Hellfireblight.
Hellfire Cloak.skill_level_3: In addition to the effects of Lv1, decreases your defense by 100 and increases your attack power by 250 while inflicted with Hellfireblight.

Heroics.description: Increases attack power when your health drops to a fixed threshold
Heroics.skill_level_1: Increases attack power by 10% when your health drops to 29% or lower.
Heroics.skill_level_2: Increases attack power by 20% when your health drops to 29% or lower.
Heroics.skill_level_3: Increases attack power by 30% when your health drops to 29% or lower.
Heroics.skill_level_4: Increases attack power by 40% when your health drops to 29% or lower.
Heroics.skill_level_5: Increases attack power by 50% when your health drops to 29% or lower.

Kushala Frostwind.description: Reduces the effects of wind pressure/dragon wind pressure, and increases ice element attack power

Kushala Frostwind.skill_level_2: Reduces the effects of wind pressure/dragon wind pressure, and increases ice element attack power by 15%.
Kushala Frostwind.skill_level_3: Reduces the effects of wind pressure/dragon wind pressure, and increases ice element attack power by 25%.

Offensive Guard.skill_level_5: Increases attack power by 40% for 10 seconds after executing a well-timed guard.

Quick Work.skill_level_3: Become significantly faster at sheathing or transforming your weapon.

Resuscitate.skill_level_5: Increases damage by 40% when you are suffering from a status ailment.

Hunter's Unity.skill_level_1: The more companions there are activating the same skill, the greater the damage inflicted.

Solidarity (Pumpkin Hunt).skill_level_1: Increases attack power the more of your fellow hunters have this skill activated. If active during the Halloween Pumpkin Hunt event, the effect is multiplied by 5.

Happy New Year (2024).skill_level_1: You'll want to wish other players a Happy New Year! (No effects)

Mr Beast Challenge!.skill_level_1: Great things will happen after using certain attacks!

Artful Dodger.description: Makes perfect evades easier to perform

Guard.skill_level_4: Greatly reduces damage and knockback when guarding against monster attacks.
Guard.skill_level_5: Massively reduces damage and knockback when guarding against monster attacks.
